import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import ChatOnline from "../../components/chatOnline/chatOnline"; import Conversation from "../../components/conversation/conversation"; import Message from "../../components/message/message"; import TopBar from "../../components/topbar/topbar"; import "./messenger.css"; import { AuthContext } from "../../context/authContext"; export default function Messenger() { const [conversations, setConversations] = useState([]); const { user } = useContext(AuthContext); return ( <>
); }
